issue.title: Standpipe changes have made mounting the hose almost impossible.

content.raw:
Please let me know how this is not giving us a point for mating the hose??  

We left the pen, got the point for lifting the hose, and mated it inside the standpipe with no orientation error.  How is this not a point?

[Movie](https://docs.google.com/file/d/0B5rZlEY4C60aWFB4cGd3TGxJSlk/edit)
